name: Ross Martin
bio: Ross Martin is a guitarist and composer based in Brooklyn, NY. He performs and records regularly, both as a solo artist and collaborator, with Grant Gordy, Matt Flinner, Ron Miles, Darol Anger, and many others from the roots music and jazz worlds. Currently, Ross can be heardsubbing on Broadway in the Tony Award®-winning musical Hadestown. He is also a dedicated instructor; he teaches at Bluegrass and roots music camps all over the US, and maintains an active guitar studio.

charity.name: Project Renewal
bio: Project Renewal’s mission is to end the cycle of homelessness by empowering individuals and families to renew their lives with health, homes, and jobs.
